thread.title: In Drought-Ridden California, the Classic Lawn Loses Ground
thread.title_full: In Drought-Ridden California, the Classic Lawn Loses Ground

title: In Drought-Ridden California, the Classic Lawn Loses Ground
text:
Published By: NYTimes US News - Today 
With help from public rebates, yards are being redefined as grass gives way to less thirsty materials, including decomposed granite....
